name: Attached Tool
description: Attach a tool to the robot.

inputParameters.name: visual_mesh
inputParameters.description: A visual mesh for the tool.

inputParameters.name: collision_mesh
inputParameters.description: A collision mesh for the tool.

inputParameters.name: tcf_plane
inputParameters.description: The frame of the tool in tool0 frame.

inputParameters.name: group
inputParameters.description: The planning group to which the tool should be attached.

inputParameters.name: connected_to
inputParameters.description: The link to which the tool should be connected to.
